title: Greek Salad
short_description: A refreshing and light salad made with fresh vegetables, feta cheese, and a tangy dressing.

steps.title: Prepare the Vegetables
steps.description: Dice the tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion. Cut the feta cheese into small cubes.

steps.title: Assemble the Salad
steps.description: In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives.

steps.title: Make the Dressing
steps.description: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.

steps.title: Finish and Serve
steps.description: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and gently toss to combine. Serve immediately and enjoy!
